resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81267</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4337</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Borrowing Money Factsheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa sobre préstamos de dinero</string>
            <string language="ga">Boleog Fírice faoi Airgead a fháil ar Iasacht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Borgen Der Geld-Checkliste</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emprunter La Fiche de données d'Argent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pedindo O Factsheet Do Dinheiro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prestiti Della Scheda Dei Soldi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δανειμένος ενημερωτικό δελτίο χρημάτων</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Factsheet outlining the rights of borrowers, the choice of lending products and the financial institutions from which finance is available. Includes revision questions.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja informativa que describe los derechos de los prestamistas, la elección de los productos de financiamiento y las instituciones financieras en las que están disponibles dichos productos. Incluye preguntas de revisión.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog fírice a imlíníonn cearta daoine a fhaigheann iasachtaí, rogha na dtáirgí iasachta agus na hinstitiúidí airgeadais óna bhfuil airgeadas le fáil. Áirítear ceisteanna achoimre leis.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Business Studies</string>
            <string language="es">Estudios empresariales. Préstamos. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Staidéar Gnó</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Borrowing</string>
            <string language="ga">Iasachtaí a fháil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Checkliste, welche die Rechte der Geldnehmer, die 
Wahl der Leihprodukte und die Geldinstitute, von denen Finanzierung, 
umreißt vorhanden ist. Schließt Änderungfragen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fiche de données traçant les grandes lignes des 
droites des emprunteurs, du choix des produits de prêt et des 
institutions financières par lesquels les finances sont fournies. 
Inclut des questions de révision.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Factsheet que esboça as direitas dos devedores, a
escolha de produtos emprestando e as instituições financeiras de que
as finanças estão disponíveis. Inclui perguntas da revisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scheda che descrive i diritti dei mutuatari, la 
scelta dei prodotti prestatori e le istituzioni finanziarie da cui la 
finanza è disponibile. Include le domande di revisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενημερωτικό δελτίο που περιγράφει τα δικαιώματα των 
οφειλετών, η επιλογή του δανεισμού των προϊόντων και των 
οικονομικών οργάνων από τα οποία η χρηματοδότηση είναι 
διαθέσιμη. Περιλαμβάνει τις ερωτήσεις αναθεώρησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschäft Studien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Borgen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Études d'Affaires</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Emprunt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudos Do Negócio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Empréstimo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Notas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi Di Affari</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Borrowing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιχειρησιακές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δανεισμός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <metadataSchema>LREv4.0</metadataSchema>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4337</entry>
          </identifier>
          <contribute>

        <rights>

            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

FN:Kevin Lawlor

        </lifeCycle>
